data.author: GCF9

data.title: A very informational review for a very lovable app.
data.content: I downloaded this app because a friend had it and she said it was free, (besides the in app purchases.) If you know me, (which you don‚Äôt) if there is a free app, I WILL GET IT! So I downloaded it and it has already helped me cope with guilt from when I was younger, stress/anxiety, bad mindsets and even mental blocks. Truly this app has helped me cope with myself and it helped show me that not everyone can be perfect or be the person they want to be, if you‚Äôre being yourself, that‚Äôs good enough. This app has changed me in the best way possible and if your reading this because your considering getting this app, I urge you to try it out. If you don‚Äôt love it, you don‚Äôt have to use it. If you love it (which you will) you should totally keep it. I hope this review was informational and I hope it convinced you to get this app. Hope you all have a positive, safe and beautiful day.

data.title: Trail subscription
data.content: I had signed up for a trial period with the understanding that I would be notified before the trial ended. Nope, they don‚Äôt send you any type of notification, and yes I should have set a reminder but come on now. Especially when you request to be notified and you‚Äôre expecting the company to do exactly what they said. And they didn‚Äôt happen, so now I‚Äôm being charged $74 for a years worth of daily affirmations that don‚Äôt even pop up like they‚Äôre supposed to. TOTALLY DISSATISFIED

data.title: Used to love, but paywall is disgusting
data.content: I used to love this app and I used it every morning with the ‚Äúpractice‚Äù feature for 15 mins to help brighten my day in the morning because I would listen to the affirmations being spoken while I would get ready. However, I will no longer be using this app. The practice feature is now behind a paywall that offers a 3-day free trial and then you have to PAY $70 PER YEAR. I‚Äôm sorry, but that is just too much for a simple affirmation app. I loved this app so much but now that almost everything is behind a paywall, I am going to stop using this app because the greed of the company is honestly disgusting to me. I hope they learn that they will continuously lose customers because of their greed. They do not care about their customers enjoying the app. All they care about is money.

data.title: A rip off
data.content: Ok sure it‚Äôs a nice app, but worth nearly $70 a year? Just for affirmations? My fitness tracking apps are nearly half that and do 100x more. I think it‚Äôs a cool app but for the price point it‚Äôs ridiculous. My bigger issue is that I requested a trial and explicitly requested I be notified before the trial ended so that I could cancel. I was NEVER notified, by email or push notification. So it automatically tried charging me. Yes, I should have kept track of that myself, so I do take some responsibility but if you‚Äôre not going to notify people then don‚Äôt tell them you are as then I would have made absolutely sure I kept track of it myself. Feels like a con to me.

data.title: Something changed
data.content: I‚Äôm changing my review to one star. I Am has been one of my favorite apps for as long as I‚Äôve had it, but right now I‚Äôm so frustrated with it. I bought premium because I wanted to create my own affirmations. I choose the ones I want to focus on and make them my favorites. I then added it to my Apple Watch. Every time I looked at my watch I was reminded of something I wanted to focus on. And if I wanted to cycle through all my favorites, I could just tap on it to get to the rest. Now, when I look at my watch I just see generic affirmations I‚Äôm not interested in. When I tap on it I can get to the rest, but I don‚Äôt want to have to do that. I‚Äôm ready to give up and remove it from my watch.

data.author: MsBiancaBabe

data.title: The ‚ÄúPremium‚Äù description needs to be updated.
data.content:
(If I misunderstood something or this isn‚Äôt accurate, please let me know so I can go check again.) 

So, let me preface this by saying I‚Äôm aware of this app being labeled as having ‚Äúin-app purchases‚Äù, but there is no way I answer all the questions from start to finish just to be told there basically is no free/basic version. Their description talks about a ‚Äúpremium‚Äù version like it‚Äôs a separate thing that you can upgrade to to get all the benefits for, but the app itself is the full premium version. You get 3 days of free access to the premium version before you have to subscribe. 

Respectfully, to anyone reading this, no I‚Äôm not some entitled individual who thinks they should get everything for free. I wouldn‚Äôt be making this if I was told in the description or upon starting the app there would only be 3 days of access before you have to subscribe. I‚Äôm not sure if this was done on purpose or if it was by mistake, but I believe you guys have to be more specific so you don‚Äôt waste anyone‚Äôs time. Especially when it comes to someone‚Äôs mental health. 

Anyways, thanks for reading this. I appreciate any feedback about this if you feel it‚Äôs needed or if I‚Äôm mistaken about something üôè.
